alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 3:32PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Kern and south central Kings Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 332 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northwest of McKittrick, or 32 miles southwest of Delano, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lost Hills and Blackwells Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198
